TopicTitle: Anyone remember this tutorial? Packing stuff inside large SAS modules and decouplers

Articles.Content:
A while ago someone posted a really neat tutorial for how to pack a bunch of components like probe cores, RCS fuel, etc. in the hollow spaces of the large SAS module or decoupler

The actual post probably got wiped out in the forum purge.. does anyone remember how to do it? I can't remember the tricks, and in just screwing around I'm not finding anything that works as cleanly
i think you just use part clipping to clip the parts together.
Be warned, though, allowing parts to clip like that can often cause phantom rotation in space, making the craft difficult or impossible to control.
